Dimensions

Dimensions of the described big.matrix object. This can be used to know the dimensions of the underlying big.matrix without having to attach it.

# S4 method for big.matrix.descriptor
nrow(x)

# S4 method for big.matrix.descriptor
ncol(x)

# S4 method for big.matrix.descriptor
dim(x)

# S4 method for big.matrix.descriptor
length(x)

Arguments

x
A big.matrix.descriptor.

Examples

X.desc <- big_attachExtdata()
dim(X.desc)
#> [1]  517 4542
dim(attach.big.matrix(X.desc))
#> [1]  517 4542

Contents
